alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 4:18AM EST until January 10 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, East Juliette, West Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Hawkinsville, Clinchfield, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Abbeville. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding of lowlands adjacent to the river begins. The water level reaches the top of the Abbeville boat ramp and also begins to flood the nearby park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:45 AM EST Monday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 10.3 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.1 feet on 05/14/1991. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
